citations.narrative:
At least three oranges stored in the fridge used to feed the black-handed spider monkeys were discolored (becoming
darker) and showing signs of spoilage. The licensee indicated he knew they were going bad. Spoiled food is not
wholesome or palatable to the animals and can make them sick if they were to eat these oranges. Discolored oranges
should be discarded once they start showing signs of spoilage. Correct starting on 8/6/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.82(a) 
   
Feeding. 
At least three oranges stored in the fridge used to feed the black-handed spider monkeys were discolored (becoming 
darker) and showing signs of spoilage. The licensee indicated he knew they were going bad. Spoiled food is not 
wholesome or palatable to the animals and can make them sick if they were to eat these oranges. Discolored oranges 
should be discarded once they start showing signs of spoilage. Correct starting on 8/6/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
